author: Jitendra Soni
title: eBay waives fees for new business sellers
description: eBay to help virus-impacted retailers move their businesses online.
content:
Online retail giant eBay has announced a new program to help small businesses and physical retailers who may be struggling to keep their operations running due to the coronavirus pandemic. 
With many bricks-and-mortar retailers forced to close, eBay has laun… [+1587 chars]
